results.question: Which organ in the body does this coronavirus primarily attack?
What does the 19 in Covid-19 stand for?
results.correct_answer: It is the year the virus was first encountered: 2019
incorrect_answers: It refers to the 19 molecules that make up the virus
It is the 19th coronavirus identified since the WHO began naming them

results.question: According to Zoopla’s search data, what feature is top of homebuyers' wish lists?

results.correct_answer: Hitting an official with a ball
